  36class VolleyballConfig:
  37    """Configuration settings for volleyball data loading."""
  38    
  39    def __init__(self):
  40        self.default_sport = "women"  # Default to women's volleyball
  41        self.cache_duration_days = 1   # How long to cache data
  42        self.enable_progress_bars = True
  43        self.auto_retry_failed_requests = True
  44        
  45    def set_default_sport(self, sport: str):
  46        """Set default sport for all volleyball functions."""
  47        valid_sports = ["women", "men", "w", "m", "wvb", "mvb"]
  48        if sport.lower() not in valid_sports:
  49            raise ValueError(f"Sport must be one of: {valid_sports}")
  50        self.default_sport = sport.lower()
  51
  52
  53# Global config instance
  54volleyball_config = VolleyballConfig()
  55
  56
  57def configure_volleyball(default_sport: str = "women", **kwargs):
  58    """
  59    Configure default settings for volleyball functions.
  60    
  61    Parameters
  62    ----------
  63    default_sport : str, default "women"
  64        Default sport for volleyball functions: "women" or "men"
  65    **kwargs
  66        Additional configuration options
  67        
  68    Examples
  69    --------
  70    >>> configure_volleyball("women")  # Default to women's volleyball
  71    >>> configure_volleyball("men")    # Default to men's volleyball
  72    """
  73    volleyball_config.set_default_sport(default_sport)
  74    for key, value in kwargs.items():
  75        if hasattr(volleyball_config, key):
  76            setattr(volleyball_config, key, value)
  77
  78
  79def _validate_volleyball_inputs(season: int, level: str | int, sport: str):
  80    """Validate common volleyball function inputs."""
  81    # Validate season
  82    current_year = datetime.now().year
  83    if season < 2010 or season > current_year + 2:
  84        raise ValueError(f"Season must be between 2010 and {current_year + 2}")
  85    
  86    # Validate level
  87    valid_levels = [1, 2, 3, "I", "II", "III", "i", "ii", "iii", "D1", "D2", "D3"]
  88    if level not in valid_levels:
  89        raise ValueError(f"Level must be one of: {valid_levels}")
  90    
  91    # Validate sport
  92    valid_sports = ["women", "men", "w", "m", "wvb", "mvb"]
  93    if sport.lower() not in valid_sports:
  94        raise ValueError(
  95            f"Sport must be one of: {valid_sports}. "
  96            f"Use 'women' (default) for women's volleyball or 'men' for men's volleyball."
  97        )
  98
  99
 100def _get_sport_params(sport: str):
 101    """Convert sport string to internal parameters."""
 102    if sport.lower() in ["women", "w", "wvb"]:
 103        return False, "WVB"  # get_mens_data=False, sport_id="WVB"
 104    elif sport.lower() in ["men", "m", "mvb"]:
 105        return True, "MVB"   # get_mens_data=True, sport_id="MVB"
 106    else:
 107        raise ValueError(f"Invalid sport: {sport}")
 108

 110def get_volleyball_teams(
 111    season: int,
 112    level: str | int,
 113    sport: str = None
 114) -> pd.DataFrame:
 115    """
 116    Retrieves a list of volleyball teams from the NCAA.
 117
 118    Parameters
 119    ----------
 120    season : int
 121        Required argument.
 122        Specifies the season you want NCAA volleyball team information from.
 123
 124    level : int | str
 125        Required argument.
 126        Specifies the level/division you want NCAA volleyball team information from.
 127        This can either be an integer (1-3) or a string ("I"-"III").
 128
 129    sport : str, optional
 130        Sport type: "women"/"w"/"wvb" for women's volleyball (default),
 131        "men"/"m"/"mvb" for men's volleyball.
 132        If None, uses the configured default.
 133
 134    Examples
 135    --------
 136    # Get all D1 women's volleyball teams for the 2024 season (most common)
 137    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2024, 1)
 138    
 139    # Get all D1 men's volleyball teams for the 2024 season
 140    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2024, 1, sport="men")
 141    
 142    # Get all D2 women's volleyball teams for the 2023 season
 143    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2023, "II")
 144    
 145    # Get all D3 women's volleyball teams for the 2022 season
 146    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2022, 3)
 147
 148    Returns
 149    -------
 150    pd.DataFrame
 151        A pandas DataFrame object with a list of college volleyball teams
 152        in that season and NCAA level.
 153    """
 154    if sport is None:
 155        sport = volleyball_config.default_sport
 156    
 157    _validate_volleyball_inputs(season, level, sport)
 158    get_mens_data, sport_id = _get_sport_params(sport)
 159    
 160    try:
 161        return _get_volleyball_teams_internal(season, level, get_mens_data)
 162    except ConnectionError as e:
 163        raise ConnectionError(
 164            f"Failed to connect to NCAA stats website. "
 165            f"Please check your internet connection and try again. "
 166            f"Original error: {e}"
 167        )
 168    except Exception as e:
 169        sport_name = "men's" if get_mens_data else "women's"
 170        raise Exception(
 171            f"Unexpected error loading {sport_name} volleyball teams for {season} season, level {level}. "
 172            f"Please report this issue with the following details: {e}"
 173        )
 174

 176def get_womens_volleyball_teams(season: int, level: str | int) -> pd.DataFrame:
 177    """
 178    Convenience function to get women's volleyball teams.
 179    
 180    Parameters
 181    ----------
 182    season : int
 183        The season year (e.g., 2024)
 184    level : str | int  
 185        NCAA division: 1/"I", 2/"II", 3/"III"
 186        
 187    Examples
 188    --------
 189    >>> df = get_womens_volleyball_teams(2024, 1)  # D1 women's volleyball
 190    >>> df = get_womens_volleyball_teams(2023, "II")  # D2 women's volleyball
 191    
 192    Returns
 193    -------
 194    pd.DataFrame
 195        Women's volleyball teams for the specified season and level.
 196    """
 197    return get_volleyball_teams(season, level, sport="women")

 200def get_mens_volleyball_teams(season: int, level: str | int) -> pd.DataFrame:
 201    """
 202    Convenience function to get men's volleyball teams.
 203    
 204    Parameters
 205    ----------
 206    season : int
 207        The season year (e.g., 2024)
 208    level : str | int  
 209        NCAA division: 1/"I", 3/"III" (note: no D2 men's volleyball)
 210        
 211    Examples
 212    --------
 213    >>> df = get_mens_volleyball_teams(2024, 1)  # D1 men's volleyball
 214    >>> df = get_mens_volleyball_teams(2023, "III")  # D3 men's volleyball
 215    
 216    Returns
 217    -------
 218    pd.DataFrame
 219        Men's volleyball teams for the specified season and level.
 220    """
 221    return get_volleyball_teams(season, level, sport="men")

 224def _get_volleyball_teams_internal(
 225    season: int,
 226    level: str | int,
 227    get_mens_data: bool = False
 228) -> pd.DataFrame:
 229    """
 230    Internal function for retrieving volleyball teams.
 231    This maintains the original implementation logic.
 232    """
 233    sport_id = ""
 234    load_from_cache = True
 235    home_dir = expanduser("~")
 236    home_dir = _format_folder_str(home_dir)
 237    teams_df = pd.DataFrame()
 238    teams_df_arr = []
 239    temp_df = pd.DataFrame()
 240    formatted_level = ""
 241    ncaa_level = 0
 242
 243    if get_mens_data is True:
 244        sport_id = "MVB"
 245        stat_sequence = 528
 246    elif get_mens_data is False:
 247        sport_id = "WVB"
 248        stat_sequence = 48
 249
 250    if isinstance(level, int) and level == 1:
 251        formatted_level = "I"
 252        ncaa_level = 1
 253    elif isinstance(level, int) and level == 2:
 254        formatted_level = "II"
 255        ncaa_level = 2
 256    elif isinstance(level, int) and level == 3:
 257        formatted_level = "III"
 258        ncaa_level = 3
 259    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
 260        level.lower() == "i" or level.lower() == "d1" or level.lower() == "1"
 261    ):
 262        ncaa_level = 1
 263        formatted_level = level.upper()
 264    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
 265        level.lower() == "ii" or level.lower() == "d2" or level.lower() == "2"
 266    ):
 267        ncaa_level = 2
 268        formatted_level = level.upper()
 269    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
 270        level.lower() == "iii" or level.lower() == "d3" or level.lower() == "3"
 271    ):
 272        ncaa_level = 3
 273        formatted_level = level.upper()
 274
 275    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/"):
 276        pass
 277    else:
 278        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/")
 279
 280    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/"):
 281        pass
 282    else:
 283        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/")
 284
 285    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/teams/"):
 286        pass
 287    else:
 288        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/teams/")
 289
 290    if exists(
 291        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/teams/"
 292        + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_teams.csv"
 293    ):
 294        teams_df = pd.read_csv(
 295            f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/teams/"
 296            + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_teams.csv"
 297        )
 298        file_mod_datetime = datetime.fromtimestamp(
 299            getmtime(
 300                f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/teams/"
 301                + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_teams.csv"
 302            )
 303        )
 304    else:
 305        file_mod_datetime = datetime.today()
 306        load_from_cache = False
 307
 308    now = datetime.today()
 309
 310    age = now - file_mod_datetime
 311
 312    if (
 313        age.days > 1 and
 314        season >= (now.year - 1) and
 315        now.month <= 7
 316    ):
 317        load_from_cache = False
 318    elif age.days >= 35:
 319        load_from_cache = False
 320
 321    if load_from_cache is True:
 322        return teams_df
 323
 324    logging.warning(
 325        f"Either we could not load {season} D{level} schools from cache, "
 326        + "or it's time to refresh the cached data."
 327    )
 328    schools_df = _get_schools()
 329
 330    # Volleyball
 331    if sport_id == "MVB":
 332        url = (
 333            "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/change_sport_year_div?"
 334            + f"academic_year={season}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0" +
 335            f"&sport_code={sport_id}"
 336        )
 337    elif sport_id == "WVB":
 338        url = (
 339            "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/change_sport_year_div?"
 340            + f"academic_year={season+1}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0" +
 341            f"&sport_code={sport_id}"
 342        )
 343
 344    response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 345
 346    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, features="lxml")
 347    ranking_periods = soup.find("select", {"name": "rp", "id": "rp"})
 348    ranking_periods = ranking_periods.find_all("option")
 349
 350    rp_value = 0
 351    found_value = False
 352
 353    while found_value is False:
 354        for rp in ranking_periods:
 355            if "final" in rp.text.lower():
 356                rp_value = rp.get("value")
 357                found_value = True
 358                break
 359            elif "-" in rp.text.lower():
 360                pass
 361            else:
 362                rp_value = rp.get("value")
 363                found_value = True
 364                break
 365
 366    if sport_id == "MVB":
 367        url = (
 368            "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/institution_trends?"
 369            + f"academic_year={season}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0&"
 370            + f"ranking_period={rp_value}&sport_code={sport_id}"
 371        )
 372    elif sport_id == "WVB":
 373        url = (
 374            "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/institution_trends?"
 375            + f"academic_year={season+1}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0&"
 376            + f"ranking_period={rp_value}&sport_code={sport_id}"
 377        )
 378
 379    best_method = True
 380    if (
 381        (season < 2017 and sport_id == "MVB")
 382    ):
 383        url = (
 384            "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/national_ranking?"
 385            + f"academic_year={season}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0&"
 386            + f"ranking_period={rp_value}&sport_code={sport_id}"
 387            + f"&stat_seq={stat_sequence}.0"
 388        )
 389        response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 390        best_method = False
 391    elif (
 392        (season < 2017 and sport_id == "WVB")
 393    ):
 394        url = (
 395            "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/national_ranking?"
 396            + f"academic_year={season+1}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0&"
 397            + f"ranking_period={rp_value}&sport_code={sport_id}"
 398            + f"&stat_seq={stat_sequence}.0"
 399        )
 400        response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 401        best_method = False
 402    elif sport_id == "MVB":
 403        try:
 404            response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 405        except Exception as e:
 406            logging.info(f"Found exception when loading teams `{e}`")
 407            logging.info("Attempting backup method.")
 408            url = (
 409                "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/national_ranking?"
 410                + f"academic_year={season}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0&"
 411                + f"ranking_period={rp_value}&sport_code={sport_id}"
 412                + f"&stat_seq={stat_sequence}.0"
 413            )
 414            response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 415            best_method = False
 416    else:
 417        try:
 418            response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 419        except Exception as e:
 420            logging.info(f"Found exception when loading teams `{e}`")
 421            logging.info("Attempting backup method.")
 422            url = (
 423                "https://stats.ncaa.org/rankings/national_ranking?"
 424                + f"academic_year={season+1}.0&division={ncaa_level}.0&"
 425                + f"ranking_period={rp_value}&sport_code={sport_id}"
 426                + f"&stat_seq={stat_sequence}.0"
 427            )
 428            response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 429            best_method = False
 430
 431    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, features="lxml")
 432
 433    if best_method is True:
 434        soup = soup.find(
 435            "table",
 436            {"id": "stat_grid"},
 437        )
 438        soup = soup.find("tbody")
 439        t_rows = soup.find_all("tr")
 440
 441        for t in t_rows:
 442            team_id = t.find("a")
 443            team_id = team_id.get("href")
 444            team_id = team_id.replace("/teams/", "")
 445            team_id = int(team_id)
 446            team_name = t.find_all("td")[0].text
 447            team_conference_name = t.find_all("td")[1].text
 448            temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
 449                {
 450                    "season": season,
 451                    "ncaa_division": ncaa_level,
 452                    "ncaa_division_formatted": formatted_level,
 453                    "team_conference_name": team_conference_name,
 454                    "team_id": team_id,
 455                    "school_name": team_name,
 456                    "sport_id": sport_id,
 457                },
 458                index=[0],
 459            )
 460            teams_df_arr.append(temp_df)
 461            del temp_df
 462    else:
 463        soup = soup.find(
 464            "table",
 465            {"id": "rankings_table"},
 466        )
 467        soup = soup.find("tbody")
 468        t_rows = soup.find_all("tr")
 469
 470        for t in t_rows:
 471            team_id = t.find("a")
 472            team_id = team_id.get("href")
 473            team_id = team_id.replace("/teams/", "")
 474            team_id = int(team_id)
 475            team = t.find_all("td")[1].get("data-order")
 476            team_name, team_conference_name = team.split(",")
 477            del team
 478            temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
 479                {
 480                    "season": season,
 481                    "ncaa_division": ncaa_level,
 482                    "ncaa_division_formatted": formatted_level,
 483                    "team_conference_name": team_conference_name,
 484                    "team_id": team_id,
 485                    "school_name": team_name,
 486                    "sport_id": sport_id,
 487                },
 488                index=[0],
 489            )
 490            teams_df_arr.append(temp_df)
 491            del temp_df
 492
 493    teams_df = pd.concat(teams_df_arr, ignore_index=True)
 494    teams_df = pd.merge(
 495        left=teams_df,
 496        right=schools_df,
 497        on=["school_name"],
 498        how="left"
 499    )
 500    teams_df.sort_values(by=["team_id"], inplace=True)
 501
 502    teams_df.to_csv(
 503        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/teams/"
 504        + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_teams.csv",
 505        index=False,
 506    )
 507
 508    return teams_df
 509

 511def load_volleyball_teams(
 512    start_year: int = 2011,
 513    sport: str = None
 514) -> pd.DataFrame:
 515    """
 516    Compiles a list of known NCAA volleyball teams in NCAA volleyball history.
 517
 518    Parameters
 519    ----------
 520    start_year : int, default 2011
 521        Specifies the first season you want NCAA volleyball team information from.
 522
 523    sport : str, optional
 524        Sport type: "women"/"w"/"wvb" for women's volleyball (default),
 525        "men"/"m"/"mvb" for men's volleyball.
 526        If None, uses the configured default.
 527
 528    Examples
 529    --------
 530    # Load in every women's volleyball team from 2011 to present day
 531    >>> df = load_volleyball_teams()
 532    
 533    # Load in every men's volleyball team from 2011 to present day  
 534    >>> df = load_volleyball_teams(sport="men")
 535    
 536    # Load in every women's volleyball team from 2020 to present day
 537    >>> df = load_volleyball_teams(start_year=2020)
 538
 539    Returns
 540    -------
 541    pd.DataFrame
 542        A pandas DataFrame object with a list of all known college volleyball teams.
 543    """
 544    if sport is None:
 545        sport = volleyball_config.default_sport
 546    
 547    get_mens_data, sport_id = _get_sport_params(sport)
 548
 549    teams_df = pd.DataFrame()
 550    teams_df_arr = []
 551    temp_df = pd.DataFrame()
 552
 553    now = datetime.now()
 554    mens_ncaa_divisions = ["I", "III"]
 555    womens_ncaa_divisions = ["I", "II", "III"]
 556    if now.month > 5 and get_mens_data is False:
 557        ncaa_seasons = [x for x in range(start_year, (now.year + 2))]
 558    elif now.month < 5 and get_mens_data is True:
 559        ncaa_seasons = [x for x in range(start_year, (now.year + 1))]
 560    else:
 561        ncaa_seasons = [x for x in range(start_year, (now.year + 1))]
 562
 563    sport_name = "men's" if get_mens_data else "women's"
 564    logging.info(
 565        f"Loading in all NCAA {sport_name} volleyball teams. "
 566        + "If this is the first time you're seeing this message, "
 567        + "it may take some time (3-10 minutes) for this to load."
 568    )
 569
 570    if get_mens_data is True:
 571        for s in ncaa_seasons:
 572            logging.info(
 573                f"Loading in men's volleyball teams for the {s} season."
 574            )
 575            for d in mens_ncaa_divisions:
 576                temp_df = _get_volleyball_teams_internal(
 577                    season=s,
 578                    level=d,
 579                    get_mens_data=True
 580                )
 581                teams_df_arr.append(temp_df)
 582                del temp_df
 583    else:
 584        for s in ncaa_seasons:
 585            logging.info(
 586                f"Loading in women's volleyball teams for the {s} season."
 587            )
 588            for d in womens_ncaa_divisions:
 589                temp_df = _get_volleyball_teams_internal(
 590                    season=s,
 591                    level=d,
 592                    get_mens_data=False
 593                )
 594                teams_df_arr.append(temp_df)
 595                del temp_df
 596
 597    teams_df = pd.concat(teams_df_arr, ignore_index=True)
 598    teams_df = teams_df.infer_objects()
 599    return teams_df
 600

 602def get_volleyball_team_schedule(team_id: int) -> pd.DataFrame:
 603    """
 604    Retrieves a team schedule, from a valid NCAA volleyball team ID.
 605
 606    Parameters
 607    ----------
 608    team_id : int
 609        Required argument.
 610        Specifies the team you want a schedule from.
 611        This is separate from a school ID, which identifies the institution.
 612        A team ID should be unique to a school, and a season.
 613
 614    Examples
 615    --------
 616    # Get the team schedule for the 2024 Toledo WVB team (D1, ID: 585329)
 617    >>> df = get_volleyball_team_schedule(585329)
 618    
 619    # Get the team schedule for the 2024 Hawaii MVB team (D1, ID: 573674)
 620    >>> df = get_volleyball_team_schedule(573674)
 621
 622    Returns
 623    -------
 624    pd.DataFrame
 625        A pandas DataFrame object with an NCAA volleyball team's schedule.
 626    """
 627    sport_id = ""
 628    schools_df = _get_schools()
 629    games_df = pd.DataFrame()
 630    games_df_arr = []
 631    season = 0
 632    temp_df = pd.DataFrame()
 633    load_from_cache = True
 634
 635    home_dir = expanduser("~")
 636    home_dir = _format_folder_str(home_dir)
 637
 638    url = f"https://stats.ncaa.org/teams/{team_id}"
 639
 640    current_year = datetime.now().year
 641    estimated_season = current_year if datetime.now().month > 7 else current_year - 1
 642
 643    season_found = False
 644    for year_offset in range(0, 3):
 645        try_season = estimated_season - year_offset
 646    
 647        # Try women's volleyball first
 648        for division in [1, 2, 3]:
 649            try:
 650                team_df = get_volleyball_teams(try_season, division, sport="women")
 651                team_match = team_df[team_df["team_id"] == team_id]
 652                
 653                if len(team_match) > 0:
 654                    season = team_match["season"].iloc[0]
 655                    ncaa_division = team_match["ncaa_division"].iloc[0]
 656                    ncaa_division_formatted = team_match["ncaa_division_formatted"].iloc[0]
 657                    sport_id = "WVB"
 658                    season_found = True
 659                    break
 660            except Exception:
 661                continue
 662        
 663        if season_found:
 664            break
 665            
 666        # Try men's volleyball
 667        for division in [1, 3]:
 668            try:
 669                team_df = get_volleyball_teams(try_season, division, sport="men")
 670                team_match = team_df[team_df["team_id"] == team_id]
 671                
 672                if len(team_match) > 0:
 673                    season = team_match["season"].iloc[0]
 674                    ncaa_division = team_match["ncaa_division"].iloc[0]
 675                    ncaa_division_formatted = team_match["ncaa_division_formatted"].iloc[0]
 676                    sport_id = "MVB"
 677                    season_found = True
 678                    break
 679            except Exception:
 680                continue
 681        
 682        if season_found:
 683            break
 684
 685    del team_df
 686
 687    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/"):
 688        pass
 689    else:
 690        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/")
 691
 692    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/"):
 693        pass
 694    else:
 695        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/")
 696
 697    if exists(
 698        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/team_schedule/"
 699    ):
 700        pass
 701    else:
 702        mkdir(
 703            f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/team_schedule/"
 704        )
 705
 706    if exists(
 707        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/team_schedule/"
 708        + f"{team_id}_team_schedule.csv"
 709    ):
 710        games_df = pd.read_csv(
 711            f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/team_schedule/"
 712            + f"{team_id}_team_schedule.csv"
 713        )
 714        file_mod_datetime = datetime.fromtimestamp(
 715            getmtime(
 716                f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/"
 717                + f"volleyball_{sport_id}/team_schedule/"
 718                + f"{team_id}_team_schedule.csv"
 719            )
 720        )
 721    else:
 722        file_mod_datetime = datetime.today()
 723        load_from_cache = False
 724
 725    now = datetime.today()
 726
 727    age = now - file_mod_datetime
 728    if (
 729        age.days > 1 and
 730        season >= now.year
 731    ):
 732        load_from_cache = False
 733
 734    if load_from_cache is True:
 735        return games_df
 736
 737    response = _get_webpage(url=url)
 738    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, features="lxml")
 739
 740    school_name = soup.find("div", {"class": "card"}).find("img").get("alt")
 741    season_name = (
 742        soup.find("select", {"id": "year_list"})
 743        .find("option", {"selected": "selected"})
 744        .text
 745    )
 746
 747    soup = soup.find_all(
 748        "div",
 749        {"class": "col p-0"},
 750    )
 751
 752    table_data = ""
 753    for s in soup:
 754        try:
 755            temp_name = s.find("div", {"class": "card-header"})
 756            temp_name = temp_name.text
 757        except Exception as e:
 758            logging.warning(
 759                f"Could not parse card header. Full exception `{e}`. "
 760                + "Attempting alternate method."
 761            )
 762            temp_name = s.find("tr", {"class": "heading"}).find("td").text
 763
 764        if "schedule" in temp_name.lower():
 765            table_data = s.find("table")
 766
 767    t_rows = table_data.find_all("tr", {"class": "underline_rows"})
 768
 769    if len(t_rows) == 0:
 770        t_rows = table_data.find_all("tr")
 771
 772    for g in t_rows:
 773        is_valid_row = True
 774        game_num = 1
 775        ot_periods = 0
 776        is_home_game = True
 777        is_neutral_game = False
 778
 779        cells = g.find_all("td")
 780        if len(cells) <= 1:
 781            continue
 782
 783        game_date = cells[0].text
 784
 785        if "(" in game_date:
 786            game_date = game_date.replace(")", "")
 787            game_date, game_num = game_date.split("(")
 788            game_date = game_date.strip()
 789            game_num = int(game_num.strip())
 790
 791        if ":" in game_date and ("PM" in game_date or "AM" in game_date):
 792            game_date = datetime.strptime(
 793                game_date,
 794                "%m/%d/%Y %I:%M %p"
 795            ).date()
 796        else:
 797            game_date = datetime.strptime(
 798                game_date,
 799                "%m/%d/%Y"
 800            ).date()
 801
 802        try:
 803            opp_team_id = cells[1].find("a").get("href")
 804        except IndexError:
 805            logging.info(
 806                "Skipping row because it is clearly "
 807                + "not a row that has schedule data."
 808            )
 809            is_valid_row = False
 810        except AttributeError as e:
 811            logging.info(
 812                "Could not extract a team ID for this game. " +
 813                f"Full exception {e}"
 814            )
 815            opp_team_id = "-1"
 816        except Exception as e:
 817            logging.warning(
 818                "An unhandled exception has occurred when "
 819                + "trying to get the opposition team ID for this game. "
 820                f"Full exception `{e}`."
 821            )
 822            raise e
 823        if is_valid_row is True:
 824            if opp_team_id is not None:
 825                opp_team_id = opp_team_id.replace("/teams/", "")
 826                opp_team_id = int(opp_team_id)
 827
 828                try:
 829                    opp_team_name = cells[1].find("img").get("alt")
 830                except AttributeError:
 831                    logging.info(
 832                        "Couldn't find the opposition team name "
 833                        + "for this row from an image element. "
 834                        + "Attempting a backup method"
 835                    )
 836                    opp_team_name = cells[1].text
 837                except Exception as e:
 838                    logging.info(
 839                        "Unhandled exception when trying to get the "
 840                        + "opposition team name from this game. "
 841                        + f"Full exception `{e}`"
 842                    )
 843                    raise e
 844            else:
 845                opp_team_name = cells[1].text
 846
 847            if opp_team_name[0] == "@":
 848                opp_team_name = opp_team_name.strip().replace("@", "")
 849            elif "@" in opp_team_name:
 850                opp_team_name = opp_team_name.strip().split("@")[0]
 851
 852            opp_text = cells[1].text
 853            opp_text = opp_text.strip()
 854            if "@" in opp_text and opp_text[0] == "@":
 855                is_home_game = False
 856            elif "@" in opp_text and opp_text[0] != "@":
 857                is_neutral_game = True
 858                is_home_game = False
 859            # This is just to cover conference and NCAA championship
 860            # tournaments.
 861            elif "championship" in opp_text.lower():
 862                is_neutral_game = True
 863                is_home_game = False
 864            elif "ncaa" in opp_text.lower():
 865                is_neutral_game = True
 866                is_home_game = False
 867
 868            del opp_text
 869
 870            score = cells[2].text.strip()
 871            if len(score) == 0:
 872                score_1 = 0
 873                score_2 = 0
 874            elif (
 875                "canceled" not in score.lower() and
 876                "ppd" not in score.lower()
 877            ):
 878                score_1, score_2 = score.split("-")
 879
 880                if any(x in score_1 for x in ["W", "L", "T"]):
 881                    score_1 = score_1.split(" ")[1]
 882
 883                if "(" in score_2:
 884                    score_2 = score_2.replace(")", "")
 885                    score_2, ot_periods = score_2.split("(")
 886                    ot_periods = ot_periods.replace("OT", "")
 887                    ot_periods = ot_periods.replace(" ", "")
 888                    ot_periods = int(ot_periods)
 889
 890                if ot_periods is None:
 891                    ot_periods = 0
 892                score_1 = int(score_1)
 893                score_2 = int(score_2)
 894            else:
 895                score_1 = None
 896                score_2 = None
 897
 898            try:
 899                game_id = cells[2].find("a").get("href")
 900                game_id = game_id.replace("/contests", "")
 901                game_id = game_id.replace("/box_score", "")
 902                game_id = game_id.replace("/", "")
 903                game_id = int(game_id)
 904                game_url = (
 905                    f"https://stats.ncaa.org/contests/{game_id}/box_score"
 906                )
 907            except AttributeError as e:
 908                logging.info(
 909                    "Could not parse a game ID for this game. "
 910                    + f"Full exception `{e}`."
 911                )
 912                game_id = None
 913                game_url = None
 914            except Exception as e:
 915                logging.info(
 916                    "An unhandled exception occurred when trying "
 917                    + "to find a game ID for this game. "
 918                    + f"Full exception `{e}`."
 919                )
 920                raise e
 921
 922            try:
 923                attendance = cells[3].text
 924                attendance = attendance.replace(",", "")
 925                attendance = attendance.replace("\n", "")
 926                attendance = int(attendance)
 927            except IndexError as e:
 928                logging.info(
 929                    "It doesn't appear as if there is an attendance column "
 930                    + "for this team's schedule table."
 931                    f"Full exception `{e}`."
 932                )
 933                attendance = None
 934            except ValueError as e:
 935                logging.info(
 936                    "There doesn't appear as if "
 937                    + "there is a recorded attendance. "
 938                    + "for this game/row. "
 939                    f"Full exception `{e}`."
 940                )
 941                attendance = None
 942            except Exception as e:
 943                logging.info(
 944                    "An unhandled exception occurred when trying "
 945                    + "to find this game's attendance. "
 946                    + f"Full exception `{e}`."
 947                )
 948                raise e
 949
 950            if is_home_game is True:
 951                temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
 952                    {
 953                        "season": season,
 954                        "season_name": season_name,
 955                        "game_id": game_id,
 956                        "game_date": game_date,
 957                        "game_num": game_num,
 958                        "ot_periods": ot_periods,
 959                        "home_team_id": team_id,
 960                        "home_team_name": school_name,
 961                        "away_team_id": opp_team_id,
 962                        "away_team_name": opp_team_name,
 963                        "home_team_sets_won": score_1,
 964                        "away_team_sets_won": score_2,
 965                        "is_neutral_game": is_neutral_game,
 966                        "game_url": game_url,
 967                    },
 968                    index=[0],
 969                )
 970                games_df_arr.append(temp_df)
 971                del temp_df
 972            elif is_neutral_game is True:
 973                t_ids = [opp_team_id, team_id]
 974                t_ids.sort()
 975
 976                if t_ids[0] == team_id:
 977                    temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
 978                        {
 979                            "season": season,
 980                            "season_name": season_name,
 981                            "game_id": game_id,
 982                            "game_date": game_date,
 983                            "game_num": game_num,
 984                            "ot_periods": ot_periods,
 985                            "home_team_id": team_id,
 986                            "home_team_name": school_name,
 987                            "away_team_id": opp_team_id,
 988                            "away_team_name": opp_team_name,
 989                            "home_team_sets_won": score_1,
 990                            "away_team_sets_won": score_2,
 991                            "is_neutral_game": is_neutral_game,
 992                            "game_url": game_url,
 993                        },
 994                        index=[0],
 995                    )
 996
 997                else:
 998                    temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
 999                        {
1000                            "season": season,
1001                            "season_name": season_name,
1002                            "game_id": game_id,
1003                            "game_date": game_date,
1004                            "game_num": game_num,
1005                            "ot_periods": ot_periods,
1006                            "home_team_id": opp_team_id,
1007                            "home_team_name": opp_team_name,
1008                            "away_team_id": team_id,
1009                            "away_team_name": school_name,
1010                            "home_team_sets_won": score_2,
1011                            "away_team_sets_won": score_1,
1012                            "is_neutral_game": is_neutral_game,
1013                            "game_url": game_url,
1014                        },
1015                        index=[0],
1016                    )
1017
1018                games_df_arr.append(temp_df)
1019                del temp_df
1020            else:
1021                temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
1022                    {
1023                        "season": season,
1024                        "season_name": season_name,
1025                        "game_id": game_id,
1026                        "game_date": game_date,
1027                        "game_num": game_num,
1028                        "ot_periods": ot_periods,
1029                        "home_team_id": opp_team_id,
1030                        "home_team_name": opp_team_name,
1031                        "away_team_id": team_id,
1032                        "away_team_name": school_name,
1033                        "home_team_sets_won": score_2,
1034                        "away_team_sets_won": score_1,
1035                        "is_neutral_game": is_neutral_game,
1036                        "game_url": game_url,
1037                    },
1038                    index=[0],
1039                )
1040
1041                games_df_arr.append(temp_df)
1042                del temp_df
1043
1044    games_df = pd.concat(games_df_arr, ignore_index=True)
1045
1046    temp_df = schools_df.rename(
1047        columns={
1048            "school_name": "home_team_name",
1049            "school_id": "home_school_id"
1050        }
1051    )
1052    games_df = games_df.merge(right=temp_df, on="home_team_name", how="left")
1053
1054    temp_df = schools_df.rename(
1055        columns={
1056            "school_name": "away_team_name",
1057            "school_id": "away_school_id"
1058        }
1059    )
1060    games_df = games_df.merge(right=temp_df, on="away_team_name", how="left")
1061    games_df["ncaa_division"] = ncaa_division
1062    games_df["ncaa_division_formatted"] = ncaa_division_formatted
1063
1064    games_df.to_csv(
1065        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/"
1066        + f"volleyball_{sport_id}/team_schedule/"
1067        + f"{team_id}_team_schedule.csv",
1068        index=False,
1069    )
1070
1071    return games_df
1072
1073
1074def get_volleyball_day_schedule(
1075    game_date: str | date | datetime,
1076    level: str | int = "I",
1077    sport: str = None
1078):
1079    """
1080    Given a date and NCAA level, this function retrieves volleyball every game
1081    for that date.
1082
1083    Parameters
1084    ----------
1085    game_date : str | date | datetime
1086        Required argument.
1087        Specifies the date you want a volleyball schedule from.
1088        For best results, pass a string formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD".
1089
1090    level : int | str, default "I"
1091        Required argument.
1092        Specifies the level/division you want a NCAA volleyball schedule from.
1093        This can either be an integer (1-3) or a string ("I"-"III").
1094
1095    sport : str, optional
1096        Sport type: "women"/"w"/"wvb" for women's volleyball (default),
1097        "men"/"m"/"mvb" for men's volleyball.
1098        If None, uses the configured default.
1099
1100    Examples
1101    --------
1102    # Get all DI women's games that were played on December 22th, 2024
1103    >>> df = get_volleyball_day_schedule("2024-12-22", level=1)
1104    
1105    # Get all division II women's games that were played on November 24th, 2024
1106    >>> df = get_volleyball_day_schedule("2024-11-24", level="II")
1107    
1108    # Get all DI men's games that will be played on April 12th, 2025
1109    >>> df = get_volleyball_day_schedule("2025-04-12", level=1, sport="men")
1110
1111    Returns
1112    -------
1113    pd.DataFrame
1114        A pandas DataFrame object with all volleyball games played on that day,
1115        for that NCAA division/level.
1116    """
1117    if sport is None:
1118        sport = volleyball_config.default_sport
1119    
1120    get_mens_data, sport_id = _get_sport_params(sport)
1121    
1122    season = 0
1123
1124    schedule_df = pd.DataFrame()
1125    schedule_df_arr = []
1126
1127    if isinstance(game_date, date):
1128        game_datetime = datetime.combine(
1129            game_date, datetime.min.time()
1130        )
1131    elif isinstance(game_date, datetime):
1132        game_datetime = game_date
1133    elif isinstance(game_date, str):
1134        game_datetime = parser.parse(
1135            game_date
1136        )
1137    else:
1138        unhandled_datatype = type(game_date)
1139        raise ValueError(
1140            f"Unhandled datatype for `game_date`: `{unhandled_datatype}`"
1141        )
1142
1143    if isinstance(level, int) and level == 1:
1144        formatted_level = "I"
1145        ncaa_level = 1
1146    elif isinstance(level, int) and level == 2:
1147        formatted_level = "II"
1148        ncaa_level = 2
1149    elif isinstance(level, int) and level == 3:
1150        formatted_level = "III"
1151        ncaa_level = 3
1152    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
1153        level.lower() == "i" or level.lower() == "d1" or level.lower() == "1"
1154    ):
1155        ncaa_level = 1
1156        formatted_level = level.upper()
1157    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
1158        level.lower() == "ii" or level.lower() == "d2" or level.lower() == "2"
1159    ):
1160        ncaa_level = 2
1161        formatted_level = level.upper()
1162    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
1163        level.lower() == "iii" or level.lower() == "d3" or level.lower() == "3"
1164    ):
1165        ncaa_level = 3
1166        formatted_level = level.upper()
1167
1168    del level
1169
1170    season = game_datetime.year
1171    game_month = game_datetime.month
1172    game_day = game_datetime.day
1173    game_year = game_datetime.year
1174
1175    if game_month > 7:
1176        season += 1
1177        url = (
1178            "https://stats.ncaa.org/contests/" +
1179            f"livestream_scoreboards?utf8=%E2%9C%93&sport_code={sport_id}" +
1180            f"&academic_year={season}&division={ncaa_level}" +
1181            f"&game_date={game_month:00d}%2F{game_day:00d}%2F{game_year}" +
1182            "&commit=Submit"
1183        )
1184    else:
1185        url = (
1186            "https://stats.ncaa.org/contests/" +
1187            f"livestream_scoreboards?utf8=%E2%9C%93&sport_code={sport_id}" +
1188            f"&academic_year={season}&division={ncaa_level}" +
1189            f"&game_date={game_month:00d}%2F{game_day:00d}%2F{game_year}" +
1190            "&commit=Submit"
1191        )
1192
1193    response = _get_webpage(url=url)
1194    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, features="lxml")
1195
1196    game_boxes = soup.find_all("div", {"class": "table-responsive"})
1197
1198    for box in game_boxes:
1199        game_id = None
1200        game_alt_text = None
1201        game_num = 1
1202        table_box = box.find("table")
1203        table_rows = table_box.find_all("tr")
1204
1205        # Date/attendance
1206        game_date_str = table_rows[0].find("div", {"class": "col-6 p-0"}).text
1207        game_date_str = game_date_str.replace("\n", "")
1208        game_date_str = game_date_str.strip()
1209        game_date_str = game_date_str.replace("TBA ", "TBA")
1210        game_date_str = game_date_str.replace("TBD ", "TBD")
1211        game_date_str = game_date_str.replace("PM ", "PM")
1212        game_date_str = game_date_str.replace("AM ", "AM")
1213        game_date_str = game_date_str.strip()
1214        attendance_str = table_rows[0].find(
1215            "div",
1216            {"class": "col p-0 text-right"}
1217        ).text
1218
1219        attendance_str = attendance_str.replace("Attend:", "")
1220        attendance_str = attendance_str.replace(",", "")
1221        attendance_str = attendance_str.replace("\n", "")
1222        if (
1223            "st" in attendance_str.lower() or
1224            "nd" in attendance_str.lower() or
1225            "rd" in attendance_str.lower() or
1226            "th" in attendance_str.lower()
1227        ):
1228            attendance_num = None
1229        elif "final" in attendance_str.lower():
1230            attendance_num = None
1231        elif len(attendance_str) > 0:
1232            attendance_num = int(attendance_str)
1233        else:
1234            attendance_num = None
1235
1236        if "(" in game_date_str:
1237            game_date_str = game_date_str.replace(")", "")
1238            game_date_str, game_num = game_date_str.split("(")
1239            game_num = int(game_num)
1240
1241        if "TBA" in game_date_str:
1242            game_datetime = datetime.strptime(game_date_str, '%m/%d/%Y TBA')
1243        elif "tba" in game_date_str:
1244            game_datetime = datetime.strptime(game_date_str, '%m/%d/%Y tba')
1245        elif "TBD" in game_date_str:
1246            game_datetime = datetime.strptime(game_date_str, '%m/%d/%Y TBD')
1247        elif "tbd" in game_date_str:
1248            game_datetime = datetime.strptime(game_date_str, '%m/%d/%Y tbd')
1249        elif (
1250            "tbd" not in game_date_str.lower() and
1251            ":" not in game_date_str.lower()
1252        ):
1253            game_date_str = game_date_str.replace(" ", "")
1254            game_datetime = datetime.strptime(game_date_str, '%m/%d/%Y')
1255        else:
1256            game_datetime = datetime.strptime(
1257                game_date_str,
1258                '%m/%d/%Y %I:%M %p'
1259            )
1260        game_datetime = game_datetime.astimezone(timezone("US/Eastern"))
1261
1262        game_alt_text = table_rows[1].find_all("td")[0].text
1263        if game_alt_text is not None and len(game_alt_text) > 0:
1264            game_alt_text = game_alt_text.replace("\n", "")
1265            game_alt_text = game_alt_text.strip()
1266
1267        if len(game_alt_text) == 0:
1268            game_alt_text = None
1269
1270        urls_arr = box.find_all("a")
1271
1272        for u in urls_arr:
1273            url_temp = u.get("href")
1274            if "contests" in url_temp:
1275                game_id = url_temp
1276                del url_temp
1277
1278        if game_id is None:
1279            for r in range(0, len(table_rows)):
1280                temp = table_rows[r]
1281                temp_id = temp.get("id")
1282
1283                if temp_id is not None and len(temp_id) > 0:
1284                    game_id = temp_id
1285
1286        del urls_arr
1287
1288        game_id = game_id.replace("/contests", "")
1289        game_id = game_id.replace("/box_score", "")
1290        game_id = game_id.replace("/livestream_scoreboards", "")
1291        game_id = game_id.replace("/", "")
1292        game_id = game_id.replace("contest_", "")
1293        game_id = int(game_id)
1294
1295        table_rows = table_box.find_all("tr", {"id": f"contest_{game_id}"})
1296        away_team_row = table_rows[0]
1297        home_team_row = table_rows[1]
1298
1299        # Away team
1300        td_arr = away_team_row.find_all("td")
1301
1302        try:
1303            away_team_name = td_arr[0].find("img").get("alt")
1304        except Exception:
1305            away_team_name = td_arr[1].text
1306        away_team_name = away_team_name.replace("\n", "")
1307        away_team_name = away_team_name.strip()
1308
1309        try:
1310            away_team_id = td_arr[1].find("a").get("href")
1311            away_team_id = away_team_id.replace("/teams/", "")
1312            away_team_id = int(away_team_id)
1313        except AttributeError:
1314            away_team_id = None
1315            logging.info("No team ID found for the away team")
1316        except Exception as e:
1317            raise e
1318
1319        away_sets_scored = td_arr[-1].text
1320        away_sets_scored = away_sets_scored.replace("\n", "")
1321        away_sets_scored = away_sets_scored.replace("\xa0", "")
1322
1323        if "ppd" in away_sets_scored.lower():
1324            continue
1325        elif "cancel" in away_sets_scored.lower():
1326            continue
1327
1328        if len(away_sets_scored) > 0:
1329            away_sets_scored = int(away_sets_scored)
1330        else:
1331            away_sets_scored = 0
1332
1333        del td_arr
1334
1335        # Home team
1336        td_arr = home_team_row.find_all("td")
1337
1338        try:
1339            home_team_name = td_arr[0].find("img").get("alt")
1340        except Exception:
1341            home_team_name = td_arr[1].text
1342        home_team_name = home_team_name.replace("\n", "")
1343        home_team_name = home_team_name.strip()
1344
1345        try:
1346            home_team_id = td_arr[1].find("a").get("href")
1347            home_team_id = home_team_id.replace("/teams/", "")
1348            home_team_id = int(home_team_id)
1349        except AttributeError:
1350            home_team_id = None
1351            logging.info("No team ID found for the home team")
1352        except Exception as e:
1353            raise e
1354
1355        home_sets_scored = td_arr[-1].text
1356        home_sets_scored = home_sets_scored.replace("\n", "")
1357        home_sets_scored = home_sets_scored.replace("\xa0", "")
1358
1359        if "ppd" in home_sets_scored.lower():
1360            continue
1361        elif "cancel" in home_sets_scored.lower():
1362            continue
1363
1364        if len(home_sets_scored) > 0:
1365            home_sets_scored = int(home_sets_scored)
1366        else:
1367            home_sets_scored = 0
1368
1369        temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
1370            {
1371                "season": season,
1372                "sport_id": sport_id,
1373                "game_date": game_datetime.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
1374                "game_datetime": game_datetime.isoformat(),
1375                "game_id": game_id,
1376                "formatted_level": formatted_level,
1377                "ncaa_level": ncaa_level,
1378                "game_alt_text": game_alt_text,
1379                "away_team_id": away_team_id,
1380                "away_team_name": away_team_name,
1381                "home_team_id": home_team_id,
1382                "home_team_name": home_team_name,
1383                "home_sets_scored": home_sets_scored,
1384                "away_sets_scored": away_sets_scored,
1385                "attendance": attendance_num
1386            },
1387            index=[0]
1388        )
1389        schedule_df_arr.append(temp_df)
1390
1391        del temp_df
1392
1393    if len(schedule_df_arr) >= 1:
1394        schedule_df = pd.concat(schedule_df_arr, ignore_index=True)
1395    else:
1396        logging.warning(
1397            "Could not find any game(s) for "
1398            + f"{game_datetime.year:00d}-{game_datetime.month:00d}"
1399            + f"-{game_datetime.day:00d}. "
1400            + "If you believe this is an error, "
1401            + "please raise an issue at "
1402            + "\n https://github.com/armstjc/ncaa_stats_py/issues \n"
1403        )
1404    return schedule_df
1405
1406
1407def get_full_volleyball_schedule(
1408    season: int,
1409    level: str | int = "I",
1410    sport: str = None
1411) -> pd.DataFrame:
1412    """
1413    Retrieves a full volleyball schedule from an NCAA level.
1414    The way this is done is by going through every team in a division,
1415    and parsing the schedules of every team in a division.
1416
1417    This function will take time when first run (30-60 minutes)!
1418    You have been warned.
1419
1420    Parameters
1421    ----------
1422    season : int
1423        Specifies the season you want a schedule from.
1424
1425    level : int | str, default "I"
1426        Specifies the level/division you want a schedule from.
1427
1428    sport : str, optional
1429        Sport type: "women"/"w"/"wvb" for women's volleyball (default),
1430        "men"/"m"/"mvb" for men's volleyball.
1431        If None, uses the configured default.
1432
1433    Examples
1434    --------
1435    # Get the entire 2024 schedule for the 2024 women's D1 volleyball season
1436    >>> df = get_full_volleyball_schedule(season=2024, level="I")
1437    
1438    # Get the entire 2024 schedule for the 2024 men's D1 volleyball season
1439    >>> df = get_full_volleyball_schedule(season=2024, level="I", sport="men")
1440
1441    Returns
1442    -------
1443    pd.DataFrame
1444        A pandas DataFrame object with an NCAA volleyball
1445        schedule for a specific season and level.
1446    """
1447    if sport is None:
1448        sport = volleyball_config.default_sport
1449    
1450    get_mens_data, sport_id = _get_sport_params(sport)
1451    
1452    load_from_cache = True
1453    home_dir = expanduser("~")
1454    home_dir = _format_folder_str(home_dir)
1455    schedule_df = pd.DataFrame()
1456    schedule_df_arr = []
1457    temp_df = pd.DataFrame()
1458    formatted_level = ""
1459    ncaa_level = 0
1460
1461    if isinstance(level, int) and level == 1:
1462        formatted_level = "I"
1463        ncaa_level = 1
1464    elif isinstance(level, int) and level == 2:
1465        formatted_level = "II"
1466        ncaa_level = 2
1467    elif isinstance(level, int) and level == 3:
1468        formatted_level = "III"
1469        ncaa_level = 3
1470    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
1471        level.lower() == "i" or level.lower() == "d1" or level.lower() == "1"
1472    ):
1473        ncaa_level = 1
1474        formatted_level = level.upper()
1475    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
1476        level.lower() == "ii" or level.lower() == "d2" or level.lower() == "2"
1477    ):
1478        ncaa_level = 2
1479        formatted_level = level.upper()
1480    elif isinstance(level, str) and (
1481        level.lower() == "iii" or level.lower() == "d3" or level.lower() == "3"
1482    ):
1483        ncaa_level = 3
1484        formatted_level = level.upper()
1485
1486    del level
1487
1488    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/"):
1489        pass
1490    else:
1491        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/")
1492
1493    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/"):
1494        pass
1495    else:
1496        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/")
1497
1498    if exists(
1499        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/" +
1500        f"volleyball_{sport_id}/full_schedule/"
1501    ):
1502        pass
1503    else:
1504        mkdir(
1505            f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/" +
1506            f"volleyball_{sport_id}/full_schedule/"
1507        )
1508
1509    if exists(
1510        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/full_schedule/"
1511        + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_full_schedule.csv"
1512    ):
1513        teams_df = pd.read_csv(
1514            f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/full_schedule/"
1515            + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_full_schedule.csv"
1516        )
1517        file_mod_datetime = datetime.fromtimestamp(
1518            getmtime(
1519                f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/" +
1520                f"volleyball_{sport_id}/full_schedule/"
1521                + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_full_schedule.csv"
1522            )
1523        )
1524    else:
1525        file_mod_datetime = datetime.today()
1526        load_from_cache = False
1527
1528    now = datetime.today()
1529
1530    age = now - file_mod_datetime
1531
1532    if (
1533        age.days > 1 and
1534        season >= now.year
1535    ):
1536        load_from_cache = False
1537
1538    if load_from_cache is True:
1539        return teams_df
1540
1541    # FIXED: Use get_volleyball_teams() for specific season instead of load_volleyball_teams()
1542    # This prevents loading all teams from 2011 onwards
1543    teams_df = get_volleyball_teams(season=season, level=ncaa_level, sport=sport)
1544    team_ids_arr = teams_df["team_id"].to_numpy()
1545
1546    for team_id in tqdm(team_ids_arr):
1547        temp_df = get_volleyball_team_schedule(team_id=team_id)
1548        schedule_df_arr.append(temp_df)
1549
1550    schedule_df = pd.concat(schedule_df_arr, ignore_index=True)
1551    schedule_df = schedule_df.drop_duplicates(subset="game_id", keep="first")
1552    schedule_df.to_csv(
1553        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/"
1554        + f"volleyball_{sport_id}/full_schedule/"
1555        + f"{season}_{formatted_level}_full_schedule.csv",
1556        index=False,
1557    )
1558    return schedule_df
1559
1560def get_volleyball_team_roster(team_id: int) -> pd.DataFrame:
1561    """
1562    Retrieves a volleyball team's roster from a given team ID.
1563
1564    Parameters
1565    ----------
1566    team_id : int
1567        Required argument.
1568        Specifies the team you want a roster from.
1569        This is separate from a school ID, which identifies the institution.
1570        A team ID should be unique to a school, and a season.
1571
1572    Examples
1573    --------
1574    # Get the volleyball roster for the 2024 Weber St. WVB team (D1, ID: 585347)
1575    >>> df = get_volleyball_team_roster(585347)
1576    
1577    # Get the volleyball roster for the 2024 Hawaii MVB team (D1, ID: 573674)
1578    >>> df = get_volleyball_team_roster(573674)
1579
1580    Returns
1581    -------
1582    pd.DataFrame
1583        A pandas DataFrame object with an NCAA volleyball team's roster for that season.
1584    """
1585    sport_id = ""
1586    roster_df = pd.DataFrame()
1587    roster_df_arr = []
1588    temp_df = pd.DataFrame()
1589    url = f"https://stats.ncaa.org/teams/{team_id}/roster"
1590    load_from_cache = True
1591    home_dir = expanduser("~")
1592    home_dir = _format_folder_str(home_dir)
1593
1594    stat_columns = [
1595        "season",
1596        "season_name",
1597        "sport_id",
1598        "ncaa_division",
1599        "ncaa_division_formatted",
1600        "team_conference_name",
1601        "school_id",
1602        "school_name",
1603        "player_id",
1604        "player_jersey_num",
1605        "player_full_name",
1606        "player_first_name",
1607        "player_last_name",
1608        "player_class",
1609        "player_positions",
1610        "player_height_string",
1611        "player_weight",
1612        "player_hometown",
1613        "player_high_school",
1614        "player_G",
1615        "player_GS",
1616        "player_url",
1617    ]
1618
1619    current_year = datetime.now().year
1620    estimated_season = current_year if datetime.now().month > 7 else current_year - 1
1621
1622    season_found = False
1623    for year_offset in range(0, 3):
1624        try_season = estimated_season - year_offset
1625    
1626        # Try women's volleyball first
1627        for division in [1, 2, 3]:
1628            try:
1629                team_df = get_volleyball_teams(try_season, division, sport="women")
1630                team_match = team_df[team_df["team_id"] == team_id]
1631                
1632                if len(team_match) > 0:
1633                    season = team_match["season"].iloc[0]
1634                    ncaa_division = team_match["ncaa_division"].iloc[0]
1635                    ncaa_division_formatted = team_match["ncaa_division_formatted"].iloc[0]
1636                    sport_id = "WVB"
1637                    season_found = True
1638                    break
1639            except Exception:
1640                continue
1641        
1642        if season_found:
1643            break
1644            
1645        # Try men's volleyball
1646        for division in [1, 3]:
1647            try:
1648                team_df = get_volleyball_teams(try_season, division, sport="men")
1649                team_match = team_df[team_df["team_id"] == team_id]
1650                
1651                if len(team_match) > 0:
1652                    season = team_match["season"].iloc[0]
1653                    ncaa_division = team_match["ncaa_division"].iloc[0]
1654                    ncaa_division_formatted = team_match["ncaa_division_formatted"].iloc[0]
1655                    sport_id = "MVB"
1656                    season_found = True
1657                    break
1658            except Exception:
1659                continue
1660        
1661        if season_found:
1662            break
1663
1664    del team_df
1665
1666    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/"):
1667        pass
1668    else:
1669        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/")
1670
1671    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/"):
1672        pass
1673    else:
1674        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/")
1675
1676    if exists(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/rosters/"):
1677        pass
1678    else:
1679        mkdir(f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/rosters/")
1680
1681    if exists(
1682        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/rosters/" +
1683        f"{team_id}_roster.csv"
1684    ):
1685        teams_df = pd.read_csv(
1686            f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/rosters/" +
1687            f"{team_id}_roster.csv"
1688        )
1689        file_mod_datetime = datetime.fromtimestamp(
1690            getmtime(
1691                f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/rosters/" +
1692                f"{team_id}_roster.csv"
1693            )
1694        )
1695    else:
1696        file_mod_datetime = datetime.today()
1697        load_from_cache = False
1698
1699    now = datetime.today()
1700
1701    age = now - file_mod_datetime
1702
1703    if (
1704        age.days >= 14 and
1705        season >= now.year
1706    ):
1707        load_from_cache = False
1708
1709    if load_from_cache is True:
1710        return teams_df
1711
1712    response = _get_webpage(url=url)
1713    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, features="lxml")
1714    try:
1715        school_name = soup.find(
1716            "div",
1717            {"class": "card"}
1718        ).find("img").get("alt")
1719    except Exception:
1720        school_name = soup.find("div", {"class": "card"}).find("a").text
1721        school_name = school_name.rsplit(" ", maxsplit=1)[0]
1722
1723    season_name = (
1724        soup.find("select", {"id": "year_list"})
1725        .find("option", {"selected": "selected"})
1726        .text
1727    )
1728
1729    try:
1730        table = soup.find(
1731            "table",
1732            {"class": "dataTable small_font"},
1733        )
1734
1735        table_headers = table.find("thead").find_all("th")
1736    except Exception:
1737        table = soup.find(
1738            "table",
1739            {"class": "dataTable small_font no_padding"},
1740        )
1741
1742        table_headers = table.find("thead").find_all("th")
1743    table_headers = [x.text for x in table_headers]
1744
1745    t_rows = table.find("tbody").find_all("tr")
1746
1747    for t in t_rows:
1748        t_cells = t.find_all("td")
1749        t_cells = [x.text for x in t_cells]
1750
1751        temp_df = pd.DataFrame(
1752            data=[t_cells],
1753            columns=table_headers,
1754        )
1755
1756        player_id = t.find("a").get("href")
1757        temp_df["player_url"] = f"https://stats.ncaa.org{player_id}"
1758
1759        player_id = player_id.replace("/players", "").replace("/", "")
1760        player_id = int(player_id)
1761
1762        temp_df["player_id"] = player_id
1763
1764        roster_df_arr.append(temp_df)
1765        del temp_df
1766
1767    roster_df = pd.concat(roster_df_arr, ignore_index=True)
1768    roster_df = roster_df.infer_objects()
1769    roster_df["season"] = season
1770    roster_df["season_name"] = season_name
1771    roster_df["ncaa_division"] = ncaa_division
1772    roster_df["ncaa_division_formatted"] = ncaa_division_formatted
1773    roster_df["team_conference_name"] = team_conference_name
1774    roster_df["school_id"] = school_id
1775    roster_df["school_name"] = school_name
1776    roster_df["sport_id"] = sport_id
1777
1778    roster_df.rename(
1779        columns={
1780            "GP": "player_G",
1781            "GS": "player_GS",
1782            "#": "player_jersey_num",
1783            "Name": "player_full_name",
1784            "Class": "player_class",
1785            "Position": "player_positions",
1786            "Height": "player_height_string",
1787            "Bats": "player_batting_hand",
1788            "Throws": "player_throwing_hand",
1789            "Hometown": "player_hometown",
1790            "High School": "player_high_school",
1791        },
1792        inplace=True
1793    )
1794
1795    roster_df[["player_first_name", "player_last_name"]] = roster_df[
1796        "player_full_name"
1797    ].str.split(" ", n=1, expand=True)
1798    roster_df = roster_df.infer_objects()
1799
1800    for i in roster_df.columns:
1801        if i in stat_columns:
1802            pass
1803        else:
1804            raise ValueError(
1805                f"Unhandled column name {i}"
1806            )
1807
1808    roster_df = roster_df.infer_objects().reindex(columns=stat_columns)
1809
1810    roster_df.to_csv(
1811        f"{home_dir}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/rosters/" +
1812        f"{team_id}_roster.csv",
1813        index=False,
1814    )
1815    return roster_df
1816
1817
1818def get_volleyball_player_season_stats(team_id: int, team_info: dict = None) -> pd.DataFrame:
1819    """
1820    Given a team ID, this function retrieves and parses
1821    the season stats for all of the players in a given volleyball team.
1822
1823    Parameters
1824    ----------
1825    team_id : int
1826        Required argument.
1827        Specifies the team you want volleyball stats from.
1828        This is separate from a school ID, which identifies the institution.
1829        A team ID should be unique to a school, and a season.
1830    
1831    team_info : dict, optional
1832        Team metadata to avoid loading all teams data. Should contain:
1833        season, ncaa_division, ncaa_division_formatted, team_conference_name,
1834        school_name, school_id, sport_id
1835
1836    Examples
1837    --------
1838    # Get the season stats for the 2024 Ohio St. team (D1, ID: 585398)
1839    >>> df = get_volleyball_player_season_stats(585398)
1840    
1841    # Get the season stats with team info to avoid data loading
1842    >>> team_info = {...}  # from get_volleyball_teams()
1843    >>> df = get_volleyball_player_season_stats(585398, team_info)
1844
1845    Returns
1846    -------
1847    pd.DataFrame
1848        A pandas DataFrame object with the season stats for
1849        all players with a given NCAA volleyball team.
1850    """
1851    sport_id = ""
1852    load_from_cache = True
1853    stats_df = pd.DataFrame()
1854    stats_df_arr = []
1855    temp_df = pd.DataFrame()
1856
1857    stat_columns = [
1858        "season",
1859        "season_name",
1860        "sport_id",
1861        "team_id",
1862        "team_conference_name",
1863        "school_id",
1864        "school_name",
1865        "ncaa_division",
1866        "ncaa_division_formatted",
1867        "player_id",
1868        "player_jersey_number",
1869        "player_last_name",
1870        "player_first_name",
1871        "player_full_name",
1872        "player_class",
1873        "player_position",
1874        "player_height",
1875        "GP",
1876        "GS",
1877        "sets_played",
1878        "MS",
1879        "kills",
1880        "errors",
1881        "total_attacks",
1882        "hit%",
1883        "assists",
1884        "aces",
1885        "serve_errors",

2300def summarize_volleyball_season(season: int, level: str | int = 1, sport: str = None) -> dict:
2301    """
2302    Get a quick summary of a volleyball season.
2303    
2304    Parameters
2305    ----------
2306    season : int
2307        The season year
2308    level : str | int, default 1
2309        NCAA division
2310    sport : str, optional
2311        Sport type, if None uses configured default
2312        
2313    Examples
2314    --------
2315    >>> summary = summarize_volleyball_season(2024, 1, "women")
2316    >>> print(f"Found {summary['total_teams']} teams in {summary['conferences']} conferences")
2317    
2318    Returns
2319    -------
2320    dict
2321        Summary information about the volleyball season
2322    """
2323    if sport is None:
2324        sport = volleyball_config.default_sport
2325        
2326    teams_df = get_volleyball_teams(season, level, sport)
2327    get_mens_data, sport_id = _get_sport_params(sport)
2328    
2329    summary = {
2330        'season': season,
2331        'sport': sport,
2332        'level': level,
2333        'total_teams': len(teams_df),
2334        'conferences': teams_df['team_conference_name'].nunique(),
2335        'conference_list': sorted(teams_df['team_conference_name'].unique()),
2336        'data_cache_location': f"{expanduser('~')}/.ncaa_stats_py/volleyball_{sport_id}/"
2337    }
2338    
2339    return summary

2342def get_womens_volleyball_season_data(season: int, level: str | int = 1) -> dict:
2343    """
2344    Get complete women's volleyball season data in one call.
2345    
2346    Parameters
2347    ----------
2348    season : int
2349        The season year
2350    level : str | int, default 1
2351        NCAA division
2352        
2353    Examples
2354    --------
2355    >>> data = get_womens_volleyball_season_data(2024, 1)
2356    >>> teams = data['teams']
2357    >>> schedule = data['schedule'] 
2358    >>> player_stats = data['player_stats']
2359    
2360    Returns
2361    -------
2362    dict
2363        Dictionary with keys: 'teams', 'schedule', 'player_stats'
2364    """
2365    teams_df = get_womens_volleyball_teams(season, level)
2366    
2367    logging.info("Loading full schedule...")
2368    schedule_df = get_full_volleyball_schedule(season, level, sport="women")
2369    
2370    # Get player stats for all teams
2371    logging.info("Loading player stats for all teams...")
2372    player_stats_list = []
2373    for _, team_row in tqdm(teams_df.iterrows(), total=len(teams_df), desc="Loading player stats"):
2374        try:
2375            # Pass team info to avoid lookup
2376            team_info = {
2377                "season": team_row["season"],
2378                "ncaa_division": team_row["ncaa_division"],
2379                "ncaa_division_formatted": team_row["ncaa_division_formatted"],
2380                "team_conference_name": team_row["team_conference_name"],
2381                "school_name": team_row["school_name"],
2382                "school_id": team_row["school_id"],
2383                "sport_id": "WVB"
2384            }
2385            stats = get_volleyball_player_season_stats(team_row['team_id'], team_info)
2386            player_stats_list.append(stats)
2387        except Exception as e:
2388            logging.warning(f"Failed to get stats for team {team_row['team_id']}: {e}")
2389    
2390    player_stats_df = pd.concat(player_stats_list, ignore_index=True) if player_stats_list else pd.DataFrame()
2391    
2392    return {
2393        'teams': teams_df,
2394        'schedule': schedule_df, 
2395        'player_stats': player_stats_df
2396    }
2397

def get_volleyball_teams( season: int, level: str | int, sport: str = None) -> pandas.core.frame.DataFrame: 
111def get_volleyball_teams(
112    season: int,
113    level: str | int,
114    sport: str = None
115) -> pd.DataFrame:
116    """
117    Retrieves a list of volleyball teams from the NCAA.
118
119    Parameters
120    ----------
121    season : int
122        Required argument.
123        Specifies the season you want NCAA volleyball team information from.
124
125    level : int | str
126        Required argument.
127        Specifies the level/division you want NCAA volleyball team information from.
128        This can either be an integer (1-3) or a string ("I"-"III").
129
130    sport : str, optional
131        Sport type: "women"/"w"/"wvb" for women's volleyball (default),
132        "men"/"m"/"mvb" for men's volleyball.
133        If None, uses the configured default.
134
135    Examples
136    --------
137    # Get all D1 women's volleyball teams for the 2024 season (most common)
138    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2024, 1)
139    
140    # Get all D1 men's volleyball teams for the 2024 season
141    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2024, 1, sport="men")
142    
143    # Get all D2 women's volleyball teams for the 2023 season
144    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2023, "II")
145    
146    # Get all D3 women's volleyball teams for the 2022 season
147    >>> df = get_volleyball_teams(2022, 3)
148
149    Returns
150    -------
151    pd.DataFrame
152        A pandas DataFrame object with a list of college volleyball teams
153        in that season and NCAA level.
154    """
155    if sport is None:
156        sport = volleyball_config.default_sport
157    
158    _validate_volleyball_inputs(season, level, sport)
159    get_mens_data, sport_id = _get_sport_params(sport)
160    
161    try:
162        return _get_volleyball_teams_internal(season, level, get_mens_data)
163    except ConnectionError as e:
164        raise ConnectionError(
165            f"Failed to connect to NCAA stats website. "
166            f"Please check your internet connection and try again. "
167            f"Original error: {e}"
168        )
169    except Exception as e:
170        sport_name = "men's" if get_mens_data else "women's"
171        raise Exception(
172            f"Unexpected error loading {sport_name} volleyball teams for {season} season, level {level}. "
173            f"Please report this issue with the following details: {e}"
174        )
